description: South Carolina police arrested Carolynn Wright, 23 for allegedly biting off a part of a Walmart employee's finger after she was caught shoplifting condoms, lubricants and panties on Sunday.
title: Walmart shopper 'bit off worker's finger after getting caught stealing condoms'
title_page: Walmart shopper 'bit off worker's finger after getting caught stealing condoms' | Daily Mail Online
text:
Carolynn Wright, 23, bit off a Walmart employee's finger after being caught shoplifting, police said
A woman was arrested for allegedly biting off a part of a Walmart employee's finger after being caught shoplifting condoms, lubricants and panties.
The woman was charged with aggravated assault and shoplifting after the attack, according to a police report made available by the Myrtle Beach Police Department and seen by Daily Mail Online.
According to the police report, which was first uncovered by the Smoking Gun, Carolynn Wright, 23, became violent after being discovered stealing from the Walmart in Myrtle Beach, South Carolina on Sunday.
It states that Walmart loss prevention officers, Candice Lawsom and Suzanne Koseroski, followed Wright out of the store and tried to stop her from taking off with her alleged loot, which included a pack of condoms, lube, a bra and two pairs of panties.
A scuffle erupted between the three women, during which Wright allegedly punched Koseroski in the head, causing her to bleed from the ear.
Wright then allegedly proceeded to chomp down on Lawsom's hand.
Refusing to let go, Wright bit off a piece of the woman's finger. The finger tip was later discovered by police.
When a customer who witnessed the altercation tried to call 911, Wright grabbed the woman's phone and then pulled her hair before getting punched in the face.
A man who was waiting in the parking lot in a gold-colored minivan told police Wright then ran up to him and told him to 'run.'
Carolynn Wright, 23, bit off a Walmart employee's finger tip after being caught shoplifting underwear and condoms
The total value of the condoms, lubricant and underwear that Carolynn Wright tried to steal from a South Carolina Walmart was $40.07, police said. Wright was charged with shoplifting and aggravated assault after biting off part of a store employee's finger
When the driver told Wright that he couldn't move because someone was standing in front of his van, Wright yelled at him to 'drive!'
Shortly afterwards, police officers caught up with Wright, who gave up resisting after being threatened with a Taser.
It was unclear on Monday whether or not the driver of the minivan was an acquaintance of Wright's.
The Walmart employee who had her finger bit off required stitches, and her finger tip was not able to be reattached, police reported.
The total value of the items that Wright tried to steal was $40.07.
Last March, Wright pleaded guilty to assault and battery charges after beating a coworker with a 'clear plastic high-heeled shoe' at a gentleman's club in Myrtle Beach, where Wright previously worked as a stripper, the Smoking Gun reported.
